product_name: Burton Riglet Reel Jr. Snowboard Leash
long_description: Attach this nifty snowboard leash to the nose of a young beginner's snowboard and you have an easy way to tow him back to the lift, or to pull him around while he gets used to standing sideways.
short_description: Attach this nifty snowboard leash to the nose of a young beginner's snowboard and you have an easy way to tow him back to the lift, or to pull him around while he gets used to standing sideways.
